name: Nox Futura
description:
Nox Futura is an in-development, open source roguelike/Dwarf Fortress-like game. Combining elements of Dwarf Fortress, Civilization, Warhammer, Douglas Adams and years of RPG experience, it is slowly becoming the game I’ve always wanted to play. It is open source, and you may browse the source on github. Updates are regularly posted to Reddit's /r/roguelikedev.

Please consider supporting the development effort on Patreon.

This is a very early build, expect things to change a lot! This is also my first venture into itch.io, so please bear with me while I get things figured out!
